response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible return on investment while maximizing the benefits of this exceptional product. Please let us know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision.", "product_price": 1100000}
